response.overview: Sakamoto Days follows Taro Sakamoto, a legendary hitman who retires from the underworld after falling in love and starting a family. Now running a quiet convenience store, he’s overweight, peaceful, and devoted to his wife and child—until his violent past comes knocking. The series blends high-octane action with sharp comedy as Sakamoto protects his family while refusing to kill again.
response.tagline: The deadliest hitman chose family life—his past won’t let him retire.
response.title: Sakamoto Days
